Title: Prohibits the sale of tobacco products, herbal cigarettes, liquid nicotine, shisha, rolling papers, electronic cigarettes or smoking paraphernalia near schools
Summary: Prohibits the sale of tobacco products, herbal cigarettes, liquid nicotine, shisha, rolling papers, electronic cigarettes or smoking paraphernalia within one thousand feet of school grounds; prohibits the issuance or renewal of licenses to sell such products to any person located within one thousand feet of school grounds.
LawCode: Add Art 13-I §§1399-aaa - 1399-ccc, Pub Health L; amd §480, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of tobacco products, herbal cigarettes, liquid nicotine, shisha, rolling papers, electronic cigarettes or smoking paraphernalia near schools; and to amend the tax law, in relation to the issuance of licenses to sell tobacco products
